actionConfiguration.body:
select name as Domain,
SUM(cast(total_video_views as decimal)) as Current_Month_views,
SUM(cast(total_video_view_total_time as decimal)) as Current_Month_Watch_Hrs
FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view
where view_date >= '{{moment().format("YYYY-MM-01")}}':: date
  		AND view_date < '{{moment()}}':: date
			AND name like {{Domain_select.selectedOptionValue ? Domain_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}}
group by Domain
order by Current_Month_views desc
